definition.procedurexml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="0" y="0"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">ReloadGun</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcitems"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">be sure to add any new weapons to this, for example item main hand = 10mm OR laser rifle OR ect</comment><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BaseGunItem</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="compare_mcitems"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">be sure to add any new weapons to this, for example item main hand = 10mm OR laser rifle OR ect</comment><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Revolver32</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Duplocate this to make another weapon reload procedure

just place the new block right under this one and add the new weapons in the OR item in main hand above</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Specific reload procedure for each weapon, I suggest duplicate this if block and use it for a new weapon reload
</comment><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BaseGunItem</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">checks if damage of gun is greater than 0, usually it would be like damage is 12 11 10 and so on but minecraft counts it as 0 being no damage until the max damage of the item. 

the else resets timer and reload to false for another gun meaning the gun in main hand is at max condition or reloaded :)</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="item_get_damage"><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_item_inventory"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Caps</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_inventory_foreach"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">checks for the ammo in the inventory and then checks the amount of ammo

can be used to take a clip size of ammo and put it in the gun</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="_placeholder"><block type="itemstack_iterator" deletable="false" movable="false"></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_iterator"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Caps</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">entity.turtle.egg_break</field><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">25</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Specific reload procedure for each weapon, I suggest duplicate this if block and use it for a new weapon reload
</comment><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BaseGunItem</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="item_get_damage"><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_iterator"></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="item_set_damage"><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="item_get_damage"><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="itemstack_get_count"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_iterator"></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="entity_nbt_logic_set"><value
